long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
刚来亚马逊跟卖，不知如何上手？
雷霆之眼浏览器插件，助您从零起步，轻松开启亚马逊之旅！

选品无忧，解决90%以上的问题！

全场景支持：从选品到运营，助力高速精准选品，避免侵权，实现运营全场景自动化，全站点覆盖。
智能品牌区分：精准区分R标、TM标、通用品牌、无品牌和死标，避免错误类目和侵权风险。
操作简便：忘掉繁琐的手动筛选，用我们的软件选品，就像玩游戏一样轻松。

雷霆之眼 V0.1.8 全新功能

1. 变体销量：一目了然的变体销量百分比，快速锁定畅销款。
2. 历史卖家：查看跟卖过该 ASIN 的历史卖家，加入监控，掌握其所有产品和上新情况。
3. 历史趋势图：全面了解产品历史趋势，决策更有依据。
4. 1688 搜索亚马逊同款：在 1688 上使用雷霆之眼，按图片搜索商品在亚马逊的销售情况。

立即下载雷霆之眼浏览器插件，为您的亚马逊之路保驾护航！


Just starting with Amazon reselling and not sure where to begin?
ThunderEye Browser Plugin helps you start from scratch and effortlessly embark on your Amazon journey!

Worry-Free Product Selection—Solving Over 90% of Your Problems!

Full-Scenario Support: From product selection to operations, we assist in fast and accurate sourcing, avoiding infringements, and achieving full operational automation across all platforms.
Intelligent Brand Distinction: Accurately differentiate between registered trademarks, TM marks, generic brands, unbranded items, and expired trademarks to avoid incorrect categories and infringement risks.
Easy to Use: Forget the tedious manual filtering. With our software, selecting products is as easy as playing a game.

ThunderEye V0.1.8 New Features

1. Variant Sales: Instantly view variant sales percentages to quickly identify best-sellers.
2. Historical Sellers: Check the history of sellers who have resold this ASIN. Add them to your watchlist to monitor all their products and new listings.
3. Historical Trend Charts: Gain a comprehensive understanding of product trends over time for more informed decision-making.
4. 1688 Search for Amazon Equivalents: Use ThunderEye on 1688 to search by image and discover how similar products are performing on Amazon.

Download the ThunderEye Browser Plugin now to safeguard your Amazon journey!
